step_feedback.feedback: Good job on the shoulder blade squeeze!  Your form was consistent across repetitions. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Try to make the circular motion smoother and more controlled. Focus on keeping your shoulders relaxed and avoid hunching.
The circular motion needs more focus and control.  Try to maintain a consistent rhythm and depth to your rolls.

exercise_summary: You performed the shoulder rolls exercise.  Step 1 was done well, maintaining a good squeeze. Steps 2 and 3 need more controlled circular motions. Remember to breathe deeply while pulling your shoulders back.
